body.name: HAOVM Android Tablet, 9 inch Tablets Octa-Core 1.6GHz Processor, 1280x800 IPS HD Display Screen, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage, 5000mAh, 2.4G/5G WiFi, 128GB Expand Dual Camera, GPS, FM, MediaPad P9
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 24 mins
features: 👉【Advanced Processor Android Tablet】 -- The octa-core processor with frequency of up to 1.6 GHz and 2GB RAM gives you higher performance than quad-core processor while consuming less power, making the devices capable and efficient.Paired with 2GB of RAM for quicker multitasking. Storage on the tablet is backed by a 32GB / 128GB storage, which should suffice most of the everyday users.

👉【Great Viewing Experience】 --The tablet comes with a sharp 9-inch display with a resolution of 1280 x 800 pixels and the display on this device offers surprisingly sharp and very good viewing angles. You will see that the color saturation is true-to-life and seems very real, unlike the over-saturated dramatic colors on other brand.

👉【Immersive & Finest Audio Indulgence】 -- HAOVM 9 inch Tablet has dual cameras of front 2MP & rear 8MP should be your good helper when it comes to the live chatting, big moment recording, random pictures capture in your life. The WiFi tablet supports Bluetooth connection with extra mouse & keyboard if needed, GPS & FM included. It also preinstalled popular apps like Netflix, YouTube, Facebook, and more for your easy & quick enjoyment.

👉【Long Battery Life】 -- The large-capacity 5000mAh battery can effortlessly support you for up to 7 - 8 hours of reading, browsing, watching movies and playing games. Hours of power packed into a device you can take anywhere.

👉【WARRANTY & SUPPORT】HAOVM Tablet PC comes with 365 days warranty. HAOVM team focuses on the customer's pleasant shopping experience and provides reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us in your free time if you have any problem, we will give you on-time TECH SUPPORT and the better customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Good Upgrade： Whether you are looking to replace your laptop or just need a tablet for the sake of it, it is important that you do your homework. HAOVM Mediapad P9 9 inch Tablet that is made for the exclusive use of the entire family! From streaming HD videos to reading e-books deep into the night, this tablet will provide a rich user experience no matter what you do! From HAOVM, You will find a tablets that provide mobility while allowing you to complete most of the tasks you would on laptops. About this product Display: 9 inch screen. Resolution 1280 x 800 pixels. IPS technology - the picture quality won't be compromised, even from a side view. Support for simultaneous display of multiple languages - detects when you switch languages while typing.

Specifications: 2.4/5.0GHz, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac2GB RAM.Internal storage capacity 32GB.micro SD memory card slot.Maximum expandable memory 128GB.Front facing camera 2MP.Rear facing camera 8MP.Android 10.0 operating system.App store compatibility: Google play store. General Features: Built-in speaker. Wi-Fi enabled. Bluetooth - enabling you to easily and wirelessly connect with other Bluetooth enabled devices. 3.5mm stereo headphone jack. Additional Information: In the box: 9 inch tablet, adaptor, USB cable, user manual. Manufacturer's 365 days (NOTE: Please use the original chrging adapter and cable which included in the package to ensuring the charging result within 2 hous)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lleno mis expectativas
reviews.reviewText: Funcional para un niño bastante bien por el precio que pago conforme con el resultado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet its not perfect, and if you looking for the perfect tablet then go buy a Samsung. But for the price it is decent. Its not blazing fast but its decently fast and it does have 2gb ram 32gb storage with Unisoc 8 core SC9863A, which is a little dated by 4 years. Haovm did a decent job with this tablet, but they needs to focus on updating the hardware with the same size 9in screen they should add 3gb ram and 64gb storage and use T310 or newer processor. Comes with Android 10, 32bit instead of 64bit system. That may not be a big deal but to use the full potential of the CPU and to get best performance your better off using 64-bit android because the CPU is a 64bit capable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very durable and price worthy
reviews.reviewText: My son really enjoys his new tablet very big screen easy for him to interact with all his activities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Revised after 2 months.A bit slow. Camera is poor. Facial recognition is unreliable. I only use this for ebook reading so it’s just fine for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's terrible. This is the second one I'm having to replace. .
reviews.reviewText: It's terrible. This is the second one I'm having to replace in 1 week. It's completely froze. Won't turn off. Won't do anything. Battery sucks. The whole thing sucks. You get what you pay for. I'm not sending it back until I'm able to remove my info.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Discounted for a reason.
reviews.reviewText: Has a hard time running chrome alone, if you have another app running at the same time it is likely to crash. Either it will close all apps or it will completely power down. I only e er used it for reading before bed, but somehow the back completely shattered. Would not recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars super fast and responsive to even slight touch, excellent speed for size.
reviews.reviewText: Fast, the touchscreen is very responsive, moves quickly on youtube and the internet, not a bad value, you might find some better deals but if you can get a discount coupon, you would get a great deal, worth buyingunder 100 bucks with Samsung-like quality
